name: Donut be so Critical
description:
Donut be so Critical is a cute and relaxing turn-based JRPG where the player plays as a mean donut critic who goes around criticizing pastries all over the world! 

Controls
  • Mouse Click - Select  / Continue 
  • WASD / Arrow Keys - Select / Player movement 
  • E - Interaction  / Continue
Gameplay

Explore the pastry world! 

Encounter various pastries! 

And criticize them! 

Be aware: they are gonna fight back!
